import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[pattern,setPattern]=useState('');const[sendValue,setSendValue]=useState('');const[responseMessage,setResponseMessage]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const fetchPattern=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('/api/memorycolourmaster/getpattern');// Update the state with the response message
